=== Introduction ===

This specification provides a way of creating new translations based on previously existing translations, or "subtranslations". This would mainly make doing CountrySpecificLanguages easier than what it is now, and could spark interest to do new regional translations.

For more information, see: https://wiki.launchpad.canonical.com/SimilarLanguages
